name: top_grossing_ipad_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetch a list of the top-grossing iPad apps from the RapidAPI App Store.

country.description: The country code (e.g., 'us' for the United States). Default is 'us'.

lang.description: The language code (e.g., 'en' for English). Default is 'en'.

category.description: The category ID for the apps. Default is '6016'.

num.description: The number of top-grossing apps to retrieve. Default is 100.
